visualcryptography.imageencryptor
Class ImageEncryptor

java.lang.Object
  visualcryptography.imageencryptor.ImageEncryptor

public class ImageEncryptor
extends java.lang.Object

ImageEncryptor is responsible for the creating the share images and so as in performing the coalesce function.

Since:
6.25.05
Author:
Edward P. Legaspi

Method Detail

randomBasisColumn

public void randomBasisColumn(Matrix c0,
                              Matrix c1,
                              MyGif sourceImage)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException,
                              net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException,
                              net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException
Preserves the size of the image by distributing only one column of the matrix that is randomly selected. This results in a lost of detail since some white pixel from the source image is encoded using black pixel on the n shares. xor-ing them produces a white.

Throws:
IOException, - UnsupportedCodecModeException, MissingParameterException, OperationFailedException
java.io.IOException
net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException

coalesceShares

public void coalesceShares(java.util.Vector filenames)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException,
                           net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException,
                           net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException
This method lets the user to superimpose the shares of images. It saves the file into the path specified located in the resource directory. And named it coalesce.gif. Without noise.

Throws:
IOException, - UnsupportedCodecModeException, MissingParameterException, OperationFailedException
java.io.IOException
net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException

xOrPixel

private int xOrPixel(int row,
                     int col,
                     int n)
Calculated by treating a white pixel as 0 and a black pixel as 1. Cancel even number of pixels, return them to white. We used the xOr-bit operator.

coalesceSharesWithNoise

public void coalesceSharesWithNoise(java.util.Vector filenames)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException,
                                    net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException,
                                    net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException
This method lets the user to superimpose the shares of images. It saves the file into the path specified located in the resource directory. And named it coalesce.gif. With noise.

Throws:
IOException, - UnsupportedCodecModeException, MissingParameterException, OperationFailedException
java.io.IOException
net.sourceforge.jiu.codecs.UnsupportedCodecModeException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.MissingParameterException
net.sourceforge.jiu.ops.OperationFailedException

orPixel

private int orPixel(int row,
                    int col,
                    int n)
Calculated by treating a white pixel as 0 and a black pixel as 1. If there is a black pixel in the column a black pixel is return. We used the or-bit operator.

getResourceString

private java.lang.String getResourceString(java.lang.String key)
This method returns a string from the visual_encryptor's resource bundle.

Submit a bug or feature at laizzez_faire07(@)yahoo.com. Visual Cryptography is an implementation of the newly discovered and developed visual encryption algorithm by Naor and Shamir at the Eurocrypt 1994. Copyright 2005 University of the Philippines, Los Ba±os, Laguna. All rights reserved.
